1.title: Epicurean Cowboy

episode of.title: Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Epicurean Cowboy cooks cedar plank salmon tacos, Consilience wines are poured, and the art class learns to wash their canvas and draw their composition. Joel meets Tamara and romance ignites! Jim makes a play for Cindy and gets busted by the teacher.

2.title: Bring Your Own Scotch

episode of.title: Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Hostess Rebecca Brand teaches her recipe of grilled artichokes, wine is flowing, and Ken brings his scotch. Joel and Tamara are now dating, and love blossoms, while Ken looks for love. Tamara and Rebecca go to the "Downtown Organization's" Art and Wine Tour and run into Rebecca's old boyfriend. The class progresses and paints their sky on their seascape.

3.title: Fiesta

episode of.title: Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Rebecca visits a seafood processing plant to pick up salmon for the party and Lucas & Lewellen Wines are poured. The class attends a fancy Santa Barbara Art Museum party and Rebecca teaches them about a Monet painting. "Fiesta" is in full swing as the class goes to the Santa Barbara Mission for a sunny afternoon celebration and students divulge private thoughts to Rebecca. Ken and Jim duel it out for Heidi's affections. Heidi chooses her boyfriend.

4.title: Life's a Beach

episode of.title: Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: The students cook together and finish their paintings in class. Some of the students go to a beautiful Fiesta party at the Santa Barbara Zoo, while other students take a walk on the beach talking about their friendships and gaining insights about the personalities of their classmates.

5.title: A Good Frame of Mind

episode of.title: Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: The students learn how to frame their paintings. They celebrate with curating, then holding an art show.

6.title: In Plain Air

episode of.title: Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: The class goes on a field trip to a winery and paints the vineyard "en plein air". An Italian chef teachers Rebecca how to make seafood pasta in a historic restored Victorian house nestled in the vineyard. The class has a five star dinner.

imdb.title: Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class
akas: Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class (United States)
plot: _Rebecca Brand's Dinner Party Art Class_ (qv) is a reality TV show that combines fine wine, fine food, and fine art into episodes of an entire evening where Santa Barbara Singles come together to learn to oil paint.::Anonymous
